title: Digital Literacy Bootcamp
summary: Empowering youth with coding and cybersecurity skills for the digital age. Learn programming fundamentals, web development, and online safety.

title: Innovation Fellowship
summary: A 6-month journey of mentorship and tech-driven solutions. Work on real-world projects while receiving guidance from industry experts.

title: Web Development Masterclass
summary: Master modern web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks. Build responsive, accessible websites.

title: Design Thinking Workshop
summary: Learn to solve problems creatively using design thinking methodology. Ideal for aspiring designers and innovators.

title: Entrepreneurship Accelerator
summary: Turn your ideas into viable businesses. Learn business planning, pitching, marketing, and fundraising strategies.

title: Mobile App Development
summary: Create native and cross-platform mobile applications. Learn iOS and Android development using modern tools.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
summary: Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning basics. Perfect introduction to the world of data science.

title: Youth Leadership Programme
summary: Develop essential leadership skills, communication abilities, and project management expertise for future leaders.

title: Graphic Design Essentials
summary: Master the fundamentals of graphic design. Learn industry-standard tools like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
